member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER

summary.para: Describes a resource barrier (transition in resource use).

remarks.para: This structure is used by the method.

member.seealso: Using Resource Barriers to Synchronize Resource States in Direct3D 12

summary.para: A -typed value that specifies the type of resource barrier. This member determines which type to use in the union below.
Specifies a enumeration constant such as for "begin only" or "end only".
A structure that describes the transition of subresources between different usages. Members specify the before and after usages of the subresources.
A structure that describes the transition between usages of two different resources that have mappings into the same heap.
A structure that describes a resource in which all UAV accesses (reads or writes) must complete before any future UAV accesses (read or write) can begin.
